snippet.title: The Fall of the Dungeon Guardians   Trailer
snippet.description:
The Fall of the Dungeon Guardians is an RPG Dungeon Crawler game, in First Person View, inspired by classics like Dungeon Master and Might & Magic, but featuring a modern combat system based on the triptych “tank/damage dealer/healer” mechanism.

More info : http://www.managames.com/DungeonGuardians/about/
Blog : http://www.managames.com/DungeonGuardians
IndieDB : http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-fall-of-the-dungeon-guardians
